tasks.title: Create Quality Improvement Tasks
tasks.description: Analyze project quality issues and create specific tasks to reach 100% quality for all strikes
tasks.prompt:
Project quality assessment shows issues preventing 100% strike success:

Quality Status:
- Strike 1 (Build): 100%
- Strike 2 (Lint): 100%  
- Strike 3 (Tests): 30%

Issues Found:
- Test Coverage and Success: Tests are failing
- Test Coverage and Success: Coverage check failed

TASK: Analyze these quality gaps and create specific improvement tasks to bring ALL strikes to 100% quality. Create tasks for:
1. Build issues (missing dependencies, build failures, configuration)
2. Code quality issues (lint errors, style violations, code standards)
3. Testing issues (failing tests, missing coverage, test setup)

Insert all improvement tasks BEFORE the strike review tasks. Strikes should always remain last in the task list.
success_criteria: All quality issues identified and analyzed
Specific improvement tasks created for each quality gap
Tasks properly prioritized and ordered before strikes
Clear path to 100% quality established

tasks.title: Fix ignore file handling test failures
tasks.description: Resolve 32 failing tests in post-tool-linter-hook.test.js related to ignore file mocking and string template issues
success_criteria: All ignore file related tests pass
Mock configurations work correctly
No template literal errors in test output

subtasks.title: Fix function return type test failures
subtasks.description: Resolve 15+ tests returning undefined instead of expected boolean values - likely due to missing async/await or incorrect mock setup

subtasks.title: Fix path resolution test failures
subtasks.description: Resolve tests expecting "/test/path" but receiving "/fallback/path" - likely path mocking or filesystem setup issues

subtasks.title: Fix object return type test failures
subtasks.description: Resolve tests expecting boolean values but receiving empty objects {} - likely incorrect function mocking or return value setup

subtasks.title: Validate test coverage and quality metrics
subtasks.description: Ensure all 377 tests pass, validate test coverage meets Strike 3 requirements (95%+), and verify no test flakiness

tasks.title: Stabilize test suite for consistent Strike 3 quality
tasks.description: Ensure all 377 tests pass consistently to achieve 100% Strike 3 quality rating
success_criteria: All tests pass (377/377)
Coverage thresholds maintained
No flaky test behavior
Strike 3 achieves 100% quality

tasks.title: Validate all strikes achieve 100% quality rating
tasks.description: Comprehensive validation that Strike 1 (Build), Strike 2 (Lint), and Strike 3 (Tests) all achieve 100% quality
success_criteria: Strike 1 (Build): 100% quality confirmed
Strike 2 (Lint): 100% quality confirmed
Strike 3 (Tests): 100% quality confirmed
All quality gates pass consistently

tasks.description: Review Strike 2: Lint and Code Quality
tasks.prompt:
Perform a comprehensive code review for Strike 2: Lint and Code Quality

Review Checklist:
1. Run all linters
2. Ensure zero lint errors
3. Check for console.log statements
4. Verify code style consistency

Provide a detailed review report with:
- Clear PASS/FAIL status for each criterion
- Specific issues found with file locations
- Remediation steps if review fails
- Overall recommendation

If the review fails, create specific tasks to address each issue found.
Be thorough but fair - focus on objective criteria.
